title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The man turned up Colinton Road then eventually down Napier Road. Wide street, big trees, even bigger houses.

title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Back at the car, a quick search on his phone came up with some info. Number 40 Napier Road had been bought by its current owners three months ago. They paid one and a half million for it.

title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: 'A guy called Innes Fisher, do you know him? He lives in Napier Road, number 40. The place is a mansion.
